lexUnit.name: prevent.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make unable to do something. (Different from Preventing.prevent.v)

sentence.text: As a further measure to prevent the possible contamination of meat destined for human consumption , legislation is being introduced which will ban the practice of splitting cattle skulls to remove head meat in abattoirs .
` Labour supports action to prevent crime and would set up a partnership between the police , the council and the local people .

Radical changes in the disposal procedure , however , should prevent a repeat of the acrimony and trading of insults which surrounded the sale of 1,300 public sector homes in the rest of the Borders last year .
Theda blanched even paler , a wicked flash and an ominous rumble preventing her from hearing the curse that issued from Mr Beckenham 's lips .
I could not prevent my father from tricking him into marrying me instead of Rachel .
A co-operative arrangement which keeps the trees healthy and prevents the animals from killing off their food supply .
Interference by iron or copper is prevented by the addition of cyanide .
There will be rules to prevent assets being acquired by the pension fund from the owner of that pension fund and vice versa .
Further acrimony was prevented by the arrival of Monsieur Gauthier with the liqueurs .
Their recently acquired understanding very often prevents them from achieving a full-blown panic attack .
Unfortunately , through fixed ages for the receipt of pensions , these reforms also forcibly prevented older people being productive members of the society and thereby reduced their social status .
Although there were various epidemics ahead , of various kinds , these no longer prevented the population from entering on a period of sustained growth between 1525 and 1550 .
The plan is intended to prevent farmers from poisoning or shooting the birds , which is against the law .

This was to prevent sparks from train wheels and engines reaching the gunpowder stores .

However , this does not prevent markets from continuing to sell weaker ERM currencies .
